title: Drawing, "Costume Design for Sir John Evans, for Production of "The Merry Wives of Windsor"", September 30, 1927
medium: Brush and wash, silver gouache, graphite on illustration board.
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: THIS DRAWING IS MY PERSONAL PROPERTY / AND MUST BE RETURNED TO ME / HENRY DREYFUSS
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Figure of woman wearing green and metallic dress and a tall hat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design for Sir John Evans, for Production of "The Merry Wives of Windsor"", September 30, 1927.
September 30, 1927. Brush and wash, silver gouache, graphite on illustration board.. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-129.
